name: I Bearly Made It
description:
A game of conspiracy, Demons, and bears. There's bearly any doubt you'll be sick of bears by the time you bearly make it out of this game alive. State of the art cutscenes.

A top down, or twin stick styled game (No controller support, yet) in which you blast demons. You have a pistol and a shotgun, both with unlimited ammo. You'll need them.

Cheat from the title screen by pressing 1-5 to jump around the levels.

WASD to move, Left click to Shoot, Right click to change weapons.

Shoot Monsters and Bearly Survive!
